subject_info:
Name: trans-hexaprenyltranstransferase activity
Definition: Catalysis of the reaction: (2E,6E)-farnesyl diphosphate + 4 isopentenyl diphosphate = 4 diphosphate + all-trans-heptaprenyl diphosphate.
Relationships:
object_info:
Name: (2E,6E)-farnesyl diphosphate + 4 isopentenyl diphosphate = all-trans-heptaprenyl diphosphate + 4 diphosphate
Definition: None
Relationships:
info: The SUBJECT and OBJECT describe the same chemical reaction. The SUBJECT provides a name and definition for the reaction, while the OBJECT provides a chemical equation for the same reaction.

subject_info:
Name: lactase activity
Definition: Catalysis of the reaction: lactose + H2O = D-glucose + D-galactose.
Relationships:
object_info:
Name: H2O + lactose = beta-D-galactose + D-glucose
Definition: None
Relationships:
info: The SUBJECT and OBJECT describe the same reaction, namely the hydrolysis of lactose into glucose and galactose. The definition of the SUBJECT specifies the reaction and the OBJECT provides the chemical equation for the same reaction.

subject_info:
Name: adenine deaminase activity
Definition: Catalysis of the reaction: adenine + H2O = hypoxanthine + NH3.
Relationships:
object_info:
Name: adenine + H(+) + H2O = hypoxanthine + NH4(+)
Definition: None
Relationships:
info: The reactions are not exactly the same. The SUBJECT reaction involves a neutral water molecule and produces ammonia, while the OBJECT reaction involves a proton and produces ammonium ion.
suggested_modifications: adenine + H(+) + H2O = hypoxanthine + NH4(+); None

subject_info:
Name: succinate dehydrogenase activity
Definition: Catalysis of the reaction: succinate + acceptor = fumarate + reduced acceptor.
Relationships:
object_info:
Name: A + succinate = AH2 + fumarate
Definition: None
Relationships:
info: The SUBJECT and OBJECT represent the same reaction, with the SUBJECT being a more descriptive and specific term for the reaction represented by the OBJECT.

subject_info:
Name: imidazoleglycerol-phosphate synthase activity
Definition: Catalysis of the reaction: phosphoribulosylformimino-AICAR-P + L-glutamine = D-erythro-imidazole-glycerol-phosphate + aminoimidazole carboxamide ribonucleotide + L-glutamate + 2 H+.
Relationships:
object_info:
Name: 5-[(5-phospho-1-deoxy-D-ribulos-1-ylimino)methylamino]-1-(5-phospho-beta-D-ribosyl)imidazole-4-carboxamide + L-glutamine = 5-amino-1-(5-phospho-beta-D-ribosyl)imidazole-4-carboxamide + D-erythro-1-(imidazol-4-yl)glycerol 3-phosphate + H(+) + L-glutamate
Definition: None
Relationships:
info: The reactions described in the SUBJECT and OBJECT are not identical. The SUBJECT describes a reaction with phosphoribulosylformimino-AICAR-P as a reactant, while the OBJECT describes a reaction with 5-[(5-phospho-1-deoxy-D-ribulos-1-ylimino)methylamino]-1-(5-phospho-beta-D-ribosyl)imidazole-4-carboxamide as a reactant. These are not the same compound.

subject_info:
Name: glycerol-1-phosphatase activity
Definition: Catalysis of the reaction: glycerol-1-phosphate + H2O = glycerol + phosphate.
Relationships:
object_info:
Name: glycerol 1-phosphate + H2O = glycerol + phosphate
Definition: None
Relationships:
info: The SUBJECT and OBJECT perfectly match in terms of the reaction they describe.
